visitNotes: Patient reports improved diet compliance. Blood sugar readings mostly in range. Advised to continue medication, monitor blood pressure at home, and schedule eye exam for diabetes screening. Follow up in 6 weeks.
alerts: A1C slightly elevated - reinforce diet adherence

visitNotes: Patient progressing well post-surgery. ROM improving. Still using cane for distance. No signs of DVT or infection. Warfarin levels therapeutic. Continue PT 3x/week. Watch for swelling, fever, or increased pain. Follow up in 2 weeks.
alerts: Post-op anticoagulation - monitor for bleeding, bruising

visitNotes: Asthma well controlled on current regimen. Patient reports occasional night cough. Allergy season approaching - continue daily controller. PEF values within personal best. Follow up in 3 months or sooner if symptoms worsen.
